ERC20 tracker helps you to check every ERC-20 wallet and stay informed about what is happening. Device is mounted with a smart card that has obtained the security level required by the financial sector, and Secure OS is built into the microprocessor to provide a secure execution environment to isolate/process private keys and data.\r\nThe fingerprint is enrolled through the fingerprint scanner and it is used to verify the owner at the signing stage of trading cryptocurrency. In addition to fingerprint, the device supports password (PIN) function.\r\nThrough the BLE(Low Power Bluetooth) interface, you can easily transfer cryptocurrency wirelessly in a mobile environment. The cryptocurrency address in QR code shown on the OLED display can be presented to receive money directly to your account.\r\nDownload the latest firmware through the USB cable included in the product package to keep your D‚ÄôCENT Biometric Hardware Wallet up to date. \r\n\r\n[Main Features]\r\n1.\tEmbedded with Secure OS developed by TEE(Trusted Execution Environment) technology experts.\r\n2.\tUse in a mobile environment through BLE(Low Power Bluetooth).\r\n3.\tDisplay the cryptocurrency address as a QR code on the OLED screen.\r\n4.\tWith battery capacity of 585mA, it lasts for one month on a single full charge.\r\n5.\tUse the USB cable included in the product package to download the latest firmware and keep the device up to date.\r\n\r\n‚ñ† D‚ÄôCENT Card-type Hardware Wallet\r\nD‚ÄôCENT Card-type Hardware Wallet allows you to manage cryptocurrency assets with a simple touch. Status is a text app that removes centralized choke points from your messages for greater privacy and secure messaging. An encrypted messaging app with end-to-end encryption and privacy by default so nobody other than you and your intended recipient can view your messages ‚Äì not even Status. Some consider it a secret messenger.\r\n\r\nPEER-TO-PEER, BORDERLESS PAYMENTS\r\nSeamlessly integrated with the cryptocurrency wallet, the Status Messenger enables anyone, anywhere to send global payments directly in a chat.\r\n\r\nSECURE ETHEREUM WALLET\r\nThe Status crypto wallet allows you to securely send, store, trade, and exchange ethereum assets such as ETH, SNT, stable coins such as DAI, as well as NFTs. Confidently take control of your cryptocurrency and digital assets with this ethereum wallet app. The Status blockchain wallet currently only supports ERC-20 and ERC-721 assets; it does not support Bitcoin.\r\n\r\nEARN WITH DEFI\r\nPut your crypto to work with the latest decentralized finance apps and decentralized exchanges (DEX) such as Maker, Aave, Uniswap, Synthetix, PoolTogether, Zerion, Kyber and more.\r\n\r\nWEB3 DAPP BROWSER\r\nBrowse the secure web and access the growing ecosystem of decentralized applications with the secure browser. Cold Wallet is safe because it is not connected to the Internet. Smallet Key Vault is an app that does not have internet access. It is essentially blocked from the network, providing a level of security similar to Cold Wallet.\r\n\r\nManage Ethereum and ERC20 tokens in one place. The concept is to support master seed and HD key to manage all virtual money in one key storage. Smart contracts are also supported.\r\n\r\nIn addition to etherium mainnet, it supports 3 test nets, so you can practice various exercises without actual ether. You can store, use and swap cryptocurrencies between different blockchains like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ) as well as tokens USDT (ERC20 token), tzBTC (Tezos wrapped Bitcoin), TBTC, WBTC (Ethereum wrapped Bitcoin) without intermediaries from your mobile wallet.\r\n\r\nWhat makes Atomex wallet special?\r\nAtomex Hybrid exchange combines advantages of centralized and decentralized exchanges:\r\n‚Ä¢ You're in control: Private keys are kept encrypted on your mobile wallet. Cross-blockchain transactions are carried out using Atomic Swaps.\r\n‚Ä¢ No additional fees: You pay only a miner fee for both regular and cross-blockchain atomic swap transactions.\r\n‚Ä¢ Stay incognito: No registration or identity verification required because Atomex is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet.\r\n‚Ä¢ Audited: All blockchain atomic swap smart-contracts and crypto wallet core library audited by LeastAuthority.\r\n‚Ä¢ Staking Tezos: Delegate your Tezos (XTZ) to trusted bakers from the Baking Bad list and bring an income.\r\nWhat is Atomic Swap exchange?\r\nAtomic swap is a technology for secure exchange of digital assets without the need to trust a third party. It‚Äôs as secure as cryptographic primitives and blockchain implementation it's based on. It's mathematically proved that in every scenario you either succeed with an exchange or get your money back. Atomex uses an on-chain implementation based on hashed timelock smart-contracts.\r\n\r\nHow long does an atomic swap take?\r\nDepending on the chosen pair of cryptocurrency, the exchange may take from several minutes to an hour. The maximum time is 6 hours, after which the coins are returned to your crypto wallet.\r\n\r\nHow are private keys stored?\r\nYour private keys are stored ONLY on your mobile wallet device, encrypted using AES-256. You have to unlock your crypto wallet with the encryption password on every start.\r\n\r\nStaking Tezos\r\nStake Tezos (XTZ) from your own wallet with a delegation function. It brings passive income automatically. Delegation in Tezos is absolutely safe. Your coins are not locked or frozen and do not move anywhere. You can spend them at any time and without any delay from your Atomex wallet. Just keep in mind, you only delegate your rights, that‚Äôs it. Atomex wallet uses Tezos Baking Bad baker‚Äôs list. So you can be sure you stake your Tezos (XTZ) with trusted bakers.\r\n\r\nHD crypto wallet\r\nHD (Hierarchical Deterministic) Crypto Wallet ‚Äî is a standard for generating a hierarchical tree-like structure of private/public addresses (keys), so that you can create as many wallets as you like and restore all of them from a single seed phrase.\r\n\r\nOpen-source\r\nAtomex is an open-source project by the Baking Bad team, which is known in the Tezos community as one of the most active ecosystem contributors.\r\n\r\nYou can leave a feedback or ask us any question via email: support@atomex.me","descriptionHTML":"Atomex ‚Äî is a non-custodial crypto wallet with a built in Atomic swap decentralized exchange (DEX). (no registration to the cryptocurrency exchange or examination is required).\r\n- In addition to Ethereum, this wallet also supports CIM and other major ERC20 tokens.\r\n- You can import the wallets you already have, and you can centrally manage multiple addresses.\r\n- Cryptocurrencies and tokens can be sent and received with just a QR code, and you can easily confirm detailed data on Etherscan.\r\n- You can check the price of the token you are interested in the \"portfolio\" section. The market price rate is also supported in the following currencies: JPY, USD, SGD.\r\n\r\n‚ñ† Reliable security\r\n- This wallet is equipped with a mnemonic function, and can be restored even if the device is stolen or lost.\r\n- The private key and recovery phrase (mnemonic) can be managed securely on your device without leaving them on our server.\r\n\r\n‚ñ† Simple user interface\r\nIt is free service that automatically gives back \"CIM points\" for using various services such as daily online shopping, game use, application download, credit card issuance, bank account opening, etc. via COINCOME.\r\n\r\nThe accumulated CIM points can be moved to an ERC-20 compatible wallet and exchanged for \"CIM tokens\" (which can then be exchanged for electronic money or points managed by other companies).\r\nCreate a wallet with \"COINCOME Wallet\" and link it with the COINCOME service to use it for asset management and transactions.\r\n\r\nClick here to register for COINCOME (for free)\r\nCOINCOME Japan: https://cimcome.jp/\r\nCOINCOME Singapore: https://cimcome.sg/\r\n\r\n‚ñ† Features to be added in future updates\r\n- The cashback service \"COINCOME\" will be integrated into —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤—ã –º–æ–≥–ª–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–µ—Å—å —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª –¥–ª—è –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç–∞–º–∏.\r\n\r\n–ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å - –º—ã –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–ª–∏—Å—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—ã–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–µ –¥–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å –∏—Ö –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–¥–µ–∂–Ω—ã–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å.\r\n\r\n–ü—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–Ω–∏–∫ –≤ –º–∏—Ä –∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤–∞–ª—é—Ç. –ú—ã –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏ –Ω–µ —Ä–æ–∂–¥–∞—é—Ç—Å—è, –∞ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤—è—Ç—Å—è. –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—ã —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞ –¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—Å—è —Å–≤–æ–∏–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Å –≤–∞–º–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤—ã –º–æ–≥–ª–∏ –ø–æ –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º—É–º—É –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞.\r\n\r\n–î–ª—è –ª—é–¥–µ–π. –ë–æ–ª—å—à–µ –Ω–µ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏, –ø–æ—Ö–æ–∂–∏–º–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã. –ù–∞—à –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å —Å–æ—á–µ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –≤ —Å–µ–±–µ –≤—Å–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ, –Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –Ω–µ –ø—ã—Ç–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤—ã—Ä–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–∞–º –≥–ª–∞–∑.\r\n\r\n–û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å. –ù–∞–º –Ω–µ—á–µ–≥–æ —Å–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —á–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫. –ò—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–¥, –æ–±–æ—Ä–æ—Ç —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞, —Å—Ä–∞–≤–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –∫–æ–º–∏—Å—Å–∏–π —Å —Ä—ã–Ω–æ—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ - –≤—Å–µ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –≤ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–µ. –ú—ã –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏–º –ø—Ä–∞–≤–¥—É, –≤–µ–¥—å —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∏ –æ—Å—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ–º —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–µ. –¢—Ä–∞–Ω–∑–∞–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏.\r\n\r\n–ö–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫ –û—Ñ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω ‚Äî What can you find inside?\r\n \r\n1) Asset data\r\n- stats, metrics and description of crypto currencies,\r\n- derivatives \r\n- custom crypto currency watchlist\r\n\r\n2) DeFi\r\n- stats of DeFi projects (lending platforms, decentralized exchanges, non custodial wallets)\r\n- their introduction with links \r\n- guides how to use them\r\n\r\n3) News\r\n- news aggregator from multiple portals and languages\r\n- tracking own news feed \r\n- updates from dev teams via CoinGecko Beam\r\n\r\n4) Exchanges\r\n- overview of services to trade and buy crypto currencies or tokens, \r\n- trading opportunities to find best place to buy or sell your coins \r\n- opportunities for arbitrage trading\r\n\r\n5) Lending and Borrowing platforms\r\n- list of services with their description \r\n- interest rates (both centralized and decentralized services)\r\n\r\n6) Portfolio\r\n- portfolio tracking of your investments with option to have multiple lists, \r\n- profits (real, theoretical) and transaction history\r\n- diversification of your funds\r\n- goals for investing\r\n- option to import/export your data\r\n\r\n7) Education\r\n- overview of resources to get educated more about financial routines, which may be complex and annoying.\r\n\r\nWith crypto currencies, as Bitcoin, we can transfer value instantly across the world without need of trusted middle men (banks), who charge you big fees and let you wait for their approval. But with smarter platforms with programmable chains, we can do much more.   \r\n\r\nThis opened space to \"Decentralized Finance\" know as DeFi. It includes known financial services, where the need of these middle men are replaced by algorithms, known as smart contracts. \r\n\r\nWith this tool, we have options to make decentralized exchanges (DEX), lending services, where you can earn interest, investing tools for sets of tokenized assets and others.\r\n\r\nThis app tries to introduce these services and provide some basic data to get familiar with it. The blockchain is a distributed ledger designed to record any cryptocoins' transactions. Behind Bitcoin, the technology residing is this Blockchain. It is decentralised and hence secure. \r\n\r\n   Bitcoin is based on a technology called \"Blockchain\". It is a network which is responsible for validation of blocks of transaction among users. Often in news, we find that \"Somebody has hacked a bank\". Unlike Banks, Blockchain is a decentralised kind of network protocol, so it is not prone to Hacking. Also, a transaction is completed within seconds to minutes. Unlike banks, the processing fee is very nominal in this case.\r\n\r\n   Blockchain technology had its first application in the form of Bitcoin. But then the actual potential was to impact the other economic sectors. For information, there are few other blockchain technologies as well, whose focus is on making Decentralised Autonomous Organisations (DAOs). Ethereum - public, permissionless.\r\n    2.
